meanings.definition: Of or relating to an agent.
meanings.sent1: The detective's agential skills helped solve the case.
meanings.sent2: The spy's agential role was crucial in the mission.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's agential cape fluttered in the wind as he saved the day.
meanings.sent4: Her agential presence commanded attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The leader's agential decisions shaped the future of the organization.

meanings.definition: Having the capacity to act or exert power.
meanings.sent1: The president's agential authority influenced the nation.
meanings.sent2: The lion's agential strength was evident in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The magician's agential wand performed tricks on its own.
meanings.sent4: The storm's agential force caused trees to sway violently.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's agential speed broke records in the race.
